fact.en: Recycling one glass bottle saves enough energy to power a computer for 30 minutes or a TV for 20 minutes.
fact.hr: Recikliranjem jedne staklene boce uštedi se energije koliko računalo potroši u 30 minuta ili televizor u 20 minuta.

fact.en: The average family home uses 6 trees worth of paper each year.
fact.hr: Potrebno je posječi 6 stabala da bi se prosječna obitelj opskrbila papirom za godinu dana.

fact.en: Glass and aluminium can be recycled and reused indefinitely without losing their qualities.
fact.hr: Staklo i aluminij se mogu reciklirati i ponovno koristiti bez gubitka kvalitete u nedogled.

fact.en: The EU produces about 25 million tonnes of plastic waste each year, but less than 30% is collected for recycling.
fact.hr: EU proizvede oko 25 milijuna tona plastičnog otpada godišnje, ali manje od 30% se reciklira.

fact.en: Each ton of recycled paper can save 17 trees, 1700 liters of oil, 4000 kilowatts of energy, and 30000 liters of water.
fact.hr: Svaka tona recikliranog papira može spasiti 17 stabala, 1700 litara nafte, 4000 kilovata energije i 30000 litara vode.

fact.en: Recycling is the best action society can do to improve the environment, the economy, sustainable manufacturing, and to prevent waste from going into the oceans.
fact.hr: Recikliranje je najbolje što društvo može poduzeti kako bi spasio okoliš, unaprijedila ekonomija, poticala održiva proizvodnja te spriječio otpad da završi u morima i oceanima.

fact.en: Recycling plastic takes 88% less energy than making it from raw materials.
fact.hr: Recikliranje plastike zahtjeca 88% manje energije nego proizvodnja iz sirovina.

fact.en: Styrofoam never decomposes. It is a product that is here to stay.
fact.hr: Stiropor se nikada ne razgrađuje. On ostaje tu zauvijek.

fact.en: 70% of total waste in offices is paper waste.
fact.hr: 70% ukupnog otpada u uredima je papirnati otpad.

fact.en: The average person generates about 2kg of waste every day – that’s 730kg a year.
fact.hr: Prosječna osoba proizvede oko 2kg otpada svaki dan – to je 730kg godišnje.

fact.en: Cardboard boxes can be recycled 5 to 7 times before being made into toilet paper, tissue or paper towels.
fact.hr: Kartonske kutije se mogu reciklirati 5 do 7 puta prije nego što se pretvore u toaletni papir, maramice ili papirnate ručnike.

fact.en: Recycling prevents the emmission of many greenhouse gases and water pollutants, and saves energy.
fact.hr: Recikliranje sprječava emisiju mnogih stakleničkih plinova i vodenih zagačivača te štedi energiju.
